About Ifty

A brief introduction about me and my interest.

Who Am I?

Iftekhar Ahmed Ifty

Hey there, I’m Iftekhar Ahmed Iftty, a mechanical engineering student and aspiring automobil engineer. Originating from Cox's Bazar, I’m currently pursuing Bachelor's degree at Islamic University of Technology (IUT), where I’m pursuing my degree in Mechanical Engineering. My passion for cars and mechanics knows no bounds. Beyond the world of mechanical engineering, I find myself deeply immersed in the realms of design, simulation, and the fascinating universe of AI. I believe that in today’s fast-paced digital landscape, being a lifelong learner is not just a choice, but a necessity. Let’s connect and explore this ever-evolving world of tech together!

- Through the system, management can view the actual inventory status of different raw material and ready product inventories and evaluate production efficiency at different stages with access to real-time data straight from the factory.
